EmailTemplate.description: HAE: When a case status is transferred to Internal Team & a new case is created
EmailTemplate.name: HAE New Case Transfer Notification To Web Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Case [{!Case.CaseNumber}] has been transferred to [{!Case.HAE_Team__c}] team.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SuppliedName},
Your request with Case Number [{!Case.Parent}] has been transferred to the [{!Case.HAE_Team__c}] team and a new case has been created. The new case number is [{!Case.CaseNumber}]. Please use this for all future reference.
Thanks,
Customer Services Team, Haemonetics Corporation
